Hello friends,

We just got a new bunch of servers ready in the racks at the heart of Silicon Valley, we are offering it at $59.99/mo low-end price recurring with no setup fees, new orders will be generally provisioned within 1 business day after payment.

About Us

TheStack has been providing high-quality web hosting services since 2015. We’ve served thousands of happy customers throughout the world so far, and we are constantly improving our services to get close to our mission: being reliable but affordable.

Hardware Spec & Price

CPU: Intel Xeon E5-2630L v2 (2.40 GHz, 6 cores, 12 threads)

RAM: 32GB

Storage: 2TB SATA

IPv4: 1 (Additional IPs available upon request)

Bandwidth: 20TB/mo on 1Gbps dedicated uplink

Anti-DDoS: Up to 150Gbps DDoS Protection

Price: $59.99/mo recurring
